result:
h1
    color: #FFF
.textColor
    color: #FFF

.myInput
    background-color: #FFF
    color: #333
    margin: 10px
    padding: 5px
    border-radius: 3px

.agentSelect
    background-color: #FFF
    color: #333
    margin: 10px
    padding: 5px
    padding-left: 10px
    padding-right: 10px
    border-radius: 3px

.searchBox
    margin: 10px
    padding: 5px
    background-color: #a78e70
    transition: 0.6s
    cursor: pointer
    &:hover
        box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.6), 4px 4px 6px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4), 6px 6px 12px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4)
.circleButton 
    background-color: #A78E70
    border: none
    padding: 25px
    font-size: 30px
    height: 150px
    width: 150px
    margin: 0 auto
    border-radius: 50%
    line-height: 100px
    transition: 0.6s
    position: relative
    top: 10%
    cursor: pointer
  
.circleButton:hover 
    box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.6), 4px 4px 6px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4), 6px 6px 12px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4)

.result-leave-active
    transition: 0s
.result-enter-active
    transition: 0.6s

.result-enter, .result-leave-to
    opacity: 0

.md-card
    width: 320px
    margin: 4px
    display: inline-block
    vertical-align: top

sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    div(:style="{'background-color':color.bgc, height: '100%'}" class="textColor")

        h1 職務代理人設定
        div
            span 關鍵字:
            input.myInput(type='text' v-model='searchQuery' placeholder='Search')
            span(class="searchBox" v-on:click="isHidden=false") 搜尋 
        transition(name="result" mode="out-in")
            div(v-if="isHidden!=true" class="searchList")
                div(:style="{'margin': '10px'}")
                    v-btn(fab dark small color="#A78E70" v-on:click="isHidden=true")
                        v-icon(dark) remove
                div( v-for='(item,index) in filteredResources' :key="index")
                    md-card(md-with-hover='' )
                        md-ripple
                            div(v-on:click='pickAgent(index)')
                                md-card-header()
                                    .md-title {{item.name}}
                                    .md-subhead {{item.jobTitle}}
                            
        transition(name="result" mode="out-in")
            div(v-if="isHidden==true")
                span 職務代理人：
                input(v-model='agent' class="myInput")
        transition(name="result" mode="out-in")
            .circleButton(:style="{'background-color':color.but}" v-if="isHidden==true" v-on:click="paseAgent()")
                router-link(to='/agentSetted' :style="{color: '#FFF'}" ) 儲存
        
        
            
            
</template>

<script>
export default {
    data(){
        return{
            index: '',
            searchQuery:'',
            isHidden: true,
            agent: '',
            agents: [
                {
                    name: "阿明",jobTitle: "助理"
                },
                {
                    name: "小美",jobTitle: "專任"
                },
                {
                    name: "小明",jobTitle: "吉祥物"
                }
            ],
            color: {
            bgc: "#333333",
            but: "#A78E70"
            }
        }
    },
    methods: {
      paseAgent: function(){
        this.$router.push({ path: '/agentSetted', query: {agent: this.agent} });
      },
      pickAgent: function(index){
        this.isHidden=true;
        this.agent=this.agents[index].name;
      }
    },
    computed: {
    filteredResources (){
      if(this.searchQuery){
      return this.agents.filter((item)=>{
        return item.name.includes(this.searchQuery);
      })
      }else{
        return this.agents;
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="sass">
h1
    color: #FFF
.textColor
    color: #FFF

.myInput
    background-color: #FFF
    color: #333
    margin: 10px
    padding: 5px
    border-radius: 3px

.agentSelect
    background-color: #FFF
    color: #333
    margin: 10px
    padding: 5px
    padding-left: 10px
    padding-right: 10px
    border-radius: 3px

.searchBox
    margin: 10px
    padding: 5px
    background-color: #a78e70
    transition: 0.6s
    cursor: pointer
    &:hover
        box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.6), 4px 4px 6px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4), 6px 6px 12px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4)
.circleButton 
    background-color: #A78E70
    border: none
    padding: 25px
    font-size: 30px
    height: 150px
    width: 150px
    margin: 0 auto
    border-radius: 50%
    line-height: 100px
    transition: 0.6s
    position: relative
    top: 10%
    cursor: pointer
  
.circleButton:hover 
    box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.6), 4px 4px 6px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4), 6px 6px 12px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4)

.result-leave-active
    transition: 0s
.result-enter-active
    transition: 0.6s

.result-enter, .result-leave-to
    opacity: 0

.md-card
    width: 320px
    margin: 4px
    display: inline-block
    vertical-align: top

</style>
